meter_reading.notes: Odometer wheels clearly show 02271.1 (2271.1 m³). The red needle on the circular dial points precisely to the 0.04 mark (0.04 m³). The sum is 2271.14 m³. The dial scale starts at 0 at 12 o'clock and increases clockwise, with each 0.01 unit representing 36 degrees, so 0.04 is at 144 degrees from 0.
